# TASK::TASK_USE_MOBILE_PHONE_TIMED

## Summary
Tells the ped to use a mobile phone for a time period

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **INT** time

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
If -1 is passed to Time the ped will never give up on the task.
